summary: Eli\'s Hot Springs adds 16 new NPCs to the Hot Springs Camp.
descriptionHtml:
Description:
This is my very first TES mod. It was mainly created to work out all issues with creating and releasing a mod for others to use. This mod adds 16 new NPCs to the Hot Springs Camp, 4 male and 12 female. Consider this a work in progress and I hope to expand upon the 16 new NPCs this mod adds to Skyrim. For now this is eye candy.

Ideas and comments are welcome.

Required Mods:
ApachiiSkyHair

Installation:
Simply decompress the archive into your skyrim folder. Please make sure ApachiiHair.esm is listed before ElisHotSprings.esm in the game\'s data files list.

Uninstall Information:
Delete the ElisHotSPrings.esm file located in your Data folder and the file ElisHotSprings.esm in the folder Data\\Textures\\actors\\character\\facegendata\\facetint.

History:
Version 0.1 - Initial release with 16 new NPCs
author: Badcock
